website_summaries.verdict: This tank will need frequent refilling, but it's an affordable  way to get in the paintball game.
pros: 800 PSI output pressure.Rugged, durable aluminum tank
Doesn't require hydro test every 5 years
cons: Not as much capacity as other tanks

customer_reviews.title: No Hydro testing HPA tank.
customer_reviews.text: Does not require Hydro test every 5 yrs. Very Light 1lb., 3,000psi. Easy to fill with hand pump. 11.74in lengtn. 2in. diameter. Regulator outputs 850psi. Good for use with Magnumairpower LLC. tank block. Too bad it does not come in 23in. in length.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Soto

customer_reviews.title: Dont purchase
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this tank I've had ordered 2 one to start with and like its weight and that one lasted 1 year the second one i ordered lasted 3 sessions and broke this kind of pissed me off because they slowly started to give off less pressure and the gauge is inaccurate once that happens. for 20 dollars more get a Ninja
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Just that simple
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Just that simple. I’m used to my 68/3000; so the weight difference is great. Just make sure you fill it every game or two. Don’t want to run out mid game.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Swift shipping
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Arrived a week earlier than it said. Using it as a backup and was assuming it was not going to be here before this weekend, low and behold it was. Great job
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan elwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and small enough for portability.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and small enough for portability. I fitted this tank onto my SIG MPX .177 pellet CO2 rifle. Shooting is so much more kicks now. Yay..thanks! great product.
customer_reviews.author: I S Finu

customer_reviews.title: Read this tank is the only one that works with that type of stock
customer_reviews.text: This is the recommended tank to work with the TMC Elite stock
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product just wish it was made in America
customer_reviews.text: Good product No complaints Other than it's not made in America
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Clark

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: Works good but don't get the amount of shots out of it I was hoping for good for messing around not for use during a match
customer_reviews.author: Joe smith

customer_reviews.title: weak presser release valve
customer_reviews.text: so i bought this as a second tank for my painball gun and so far i have blown 2 valves before it reaches 3k psi so i run it about 2600 to 2700psi so it dosent burst
customer_reviews.author: Leola

customer_reviews.title: Lies
customer_reviews.text: This sum bs the picture lied to me the gauge was on the opposite side of the part where you fill it up, since the gauge was positioned like that my stock for the TMC elite would connect, had to return this piece of dookie
customer_reviews.author: Yeaaaaboyyyy

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Tank and Regulator for HPA !!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the tank when I converted a QB78/QB79 to HPA. Tank and gauge pretty much the same as the Ninja 13 CI's. The tanks may have an older production date on them, but don't need to be tested for my application. The regulator can be shimmed with different Belleville washers to change the regulators set point.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Its an air tank
customer_reviews.text: Works good only used it once so far but works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tippman Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice small tank that pairs nicely with my empire sniper.. my only complaint is that the tank is already almost 4 years old which means I'm gonna have to have it hydrotested next year not really a huge deal to me so I still give 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok tank
customer_reviews.text: Small profile and light weight but only fills to the 2,000 PSI mark. Plus I can only get 40 to 50 shots out of a tank with semi auto fire on my used Tippmann 98 custom with a stock barrel. Paintballs fly 30 to 40 yards with this tank. Won't be buying anymore of these tanks for paintballing. Guess you could paintball with this but your gonna have to buy 10 or 20 tanks per person. Lol! Just gonna end up using this for pest control in my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Moon

customer_reviews.title: PB Sports are the really good guys! The tank is solid and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a review for PB Sports ― thanks you for fixing my order! PB Sports are the really good guys! The tank is solid and durable, pretty light for a metal HPA tank.
customer_reviews.author: Kikko

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I paid too much for this darn thing and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. I feel like I paid too much for this darn thing and it doesn't fit properly in the stock of my M17. Guess i didn't research enough.
customer_reviews.author: Paintman

customer_reviews.title: The Tank works fine on my pellet gun
customer_reviews.text: The Tank works fine on my pellet gun; was able to adjust the regulator's output pressure to 1450 psi with Belleville washers. The only problem I saw with my tank, purchased recently for $50, was that the hydro test dated July 2014 or 1.5 year ago! 13 CI Ninja tanks purchased previously, were date a few months before, not 1.5 years. Tanks are tested every 5 years, so you just lost 1.5 year of testing time for a $10 savings? You should think about that?
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

product_meta.title: Tippmann Aluminum HPA Tank - 13/3000
product_meta.description: 800 PSI Output PressureDurable, Rugged Aluminum TankTC & DOT Certified
feature_bullets: Great performance at a low price.
